segments.text: I'm here for a facial . I made an appointment over the phone for 3:30 today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok . Which facial would you like ? We have five different kinds of facials .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , since it's summer and it looks like you've had quite a bit of sun , I'd recommend our summer special . It's especially suited for individuals with sensitive skin .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The facial will start with a thorough cleansing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Does it include a facial mask and a massage ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . The stimulation mask promotes blood flow and will firm up the skin . You can also choose to either get a hand or back massage as well .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Will you exfoliate the skin as well ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . We'll also apply some of our special day cream that will moisturize our skin and protect it from the sun .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds great . I'll have that one then .
segments.speaker: S2
